_sText:
________________________________________________________________________________

I made this map based off of the multiplayer of Splinter Cell: Double Agent. The Ts are the spies and are trying to steal the "intel" from the CTS. The Ts have 5 mins to do this.

***Spies***

- Smoke grenade
- Spy suit (black)
- Night vision goggles
- Low grav (80%)
- Health Regeneration
- USP
- Partly invisible
- Body Armour

***CTs***

- USP
- MP5
- 150 HP
- Grenade
- Body Armour

The spies have to first steal the keycard that's in a conference room, and then bring the keycard to the vault door. Then they have to take the briefcase from the vault and bring it back to their spawn.


- Generator: Found in back of basement and when the button to it is shot, all the lights will shut off for 60 seconds.

- 2 Splinter cell songs 

***PICTURES***

 1. Lobby of building
 2. Conference room (keycard in middle)
 3. Bathroom
 4. T spawn
 5. Intel/Inside of vault
 6. Layout of map

________________________________________________________________________________

***FIXES FOR V2***

 - Change briefcase to brushes
 - CTs get MP5s instead of UMPs
 - CTs get grenades
 - CTs don't get night vision goggles
 - The generator can only be shot out once
 - Everyone gets body armour
 - Added weapons scattered around the map
 - Music is louder
 - Other small stuff

________________________________________________________________________________

I've changed they system so that you drop the bomb into a hole to open the vault and end the round. This should fix  it from being so glitchy.
________________________________________________________________________________


HOPE YOU LIKE IT!
